html: (2 Nephi 8:5)."The isles shall wait upon me." Isles represent far distant places. In 1831, the Lord told the leaders of His fledgling latter-day Church to "send forth the elders of my church unto the nations which are afar off; unto the islands of the sea; send forth unto foreign lands; call upon all nations." (D&C 133:8.) The inhabitants of these far distant places wait for the message of salvation.
